March 2, 2016

MARK GRZAN: MORGAN HILL LAND ANNEXATION DEADLY FOR FARMING

The city of Morgan Hill is proposing to annex and develop 229 acres of prime farmland in an area known as the Southeast Quadrant. The city claims this annexation will preserve farmland. The absurdity of the plan is matched by its lack of meritâ€¦
